entry_conditions: BTC 4-hour Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.1 for at least 12 consecutive periods
Subsequent 4-hour candle closes with >2.5% move outside the Bollinger Bands
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
DEFCON level >= 4 (no extreme risk conditions)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves another 2.0% against position beyond entry
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

entry_conditions: BTC experiences -3% to -5% move in a single 4-hour candle
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
No major scheduled events in next 24 hours
Volatility skew (put IV - call IV) < 15% (not already pricing in asymmetry)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price recovers to within 1% of pre-shock level within 6 hours

entry_conditions: Ratio of 1-hour volatility to 4-hour volatility > 1.4 for 3 consecutive hours
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
Absolute price change < 2% during the 3-hour period (compression before expansion)
Volume increase < 50% (not yet widely recognized)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volatility ratio normalizes to <1.1 for 2 consecutive hours
exit_conditions.take_profit: 4-hour volatility increases by 80% from entry level

input_signals.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Fade in Neutral Regime
entry_conditions: BTC 4-hour Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.1 for at least 12 consecutive periods
Subsequent 4-hour candle closes with >2.5% move outside the Bollinger Bands
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
DEFCON level >= 4 (no extreme risk conditions)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves another 2.0% against position beyond entry
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

input_signals.title: Asymmetric Volatility Response to Negative vs Positive Shocks in Neutral Conditions
entry_conditions: BTC experiences -3% to -5% move in a single 4-hour candle
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
No major scheduled events in next 24 hours
Volatility skew (put IV - call IV) < 15% (not already pricing in asymmetry)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price recovers to within 1% of pre-shock level within 6 hours

input_signals.title: Intraday Volatility Regime Transition Detection
entry_conditions: Ratio of 1-hour volatility to 4-hour volatility > 1.4 for 3 consecutive hours
Current regime = NEUTRAL (confidence > 50%)
Absolute price change < 2% during the 3-hour period (compression before expansion)
Volume increase < 50% (not yet widely recognized)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volatility ratio normalizes to <1.1 for 2 consecutive hours
exit_conditions.take_profit: 4-hour volatility increases by 80% from entry level
